body_html: Was just having similar problems, and double-checked multiple times that everything was set up correctly. Turned out my example ops were too "cheap" to compute, and adding a file_writer.flush() after adding the summary to the write solved the issue.
body_text: Was just having similar problems, and double-checked multiple times that everything was set up correctly. Turned out my example ops were too "cheap" to compute, and adding a file_writer.flush() after adding the summary to the write solved the issue.
body: Was just having similar problems, and double-checked multiple times that everything was set up correctly. Turned out my example ops were too "cheap" to compute, and adding a `file_writer.flush()` after adding the summary to the write solved the issue.
